list.name: Changes
list.comment:
v 3.0.0
Update: All Products Page Fixed and Stabilized
Resolved issue where All Products page displayed no items across all categories.
Added universal JSON resolver to handle inconsistent backend response structures.
Rebuilt complete Products.js with stable, production-ready logic.
Ensured correct mapping of image paths and category folders.
Verified backend API compatibility with GoDaddy hosting environment.
System now loads Tea, Coconut, Spices, and Rice products reliably on all pages.
